title: Siliņa in Paris on Tuesday for Ukraine support talks
summary_full: Latvian Prime Minister Evika Siliņa is on a working visit to Paris, France on Tuesday, January 6th, where she will participate in a meeting of leaders of the 'Coalition of the Willing' countries supporting Ukraine, which will also be attended by Ukraine's heroic President Volodymyr Zelenskyy.
